sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Delete the duplicate records on awa_agent_capacity, awa_agent_channel_availability, and awa_agent_presence tables. Delete other than latest records.</description>
        <name>DeleteDuplicateAWAEntries</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var pluginActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.glide.awa');
if (pluginActive) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('awa_agent_presence');
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.orderBy('agent');
    gr.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
    gr.query();
    var agent;
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (agent && agent === gr.getValue('agent')) {
            gr.deleteRecord();
        } else {
            agent = gr.getValue('agent');
        }
    }
    gr.setWorkflow(true);

    gr = new GlideRecord('awa_agent_capacity');
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.orderBy('user');
    gr.orderBy('channel');
    gr.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
    gr.query();
    var user;
    var channel;
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (user && user === gr.getValue('user')) {
            if (channel && channel === gr.getValue('channel')) {
                gr.deleteRecord();
            } else {
                channel = gr.getValue('channel');
            }
        } else {
            user = gr.getValue('user');
            channel = gr.getValue('channel');
        }
    }
    gr.setWorkflow(true);

    gr = new GlideRecord('awa_agent_channel_availability');
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.orderBy('agent');
    gr.orderBy('service_channel');
    gr.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
    gr.query();
    var serviceChannel;
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (agent && agent === gr.getValue('agent')) {
            if (serviceChannel && serviceChannel === gr.getValue('service_channel')) {
                gr.deleteRecord();
            } else {
                serviceChannel = gr.getValue('service_channel');
            }
        } else {
            agent = gr.getValue('agent');
            serviceChannel = gr.getValue('service_channel');
        }
    }
    gr.setWorkflow(true);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-07-19 11:35:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>becaaf7fc3913010d81b6e221f40dd11</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DeleteDuplicateAWAEntries</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">7f858779db01111086a072c7f496190d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_becaaf7fc3913010d81b6e221f40dd11</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-07-19 11:37:18</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
